===Etymology 1===
/sihi<small>1</small>to<small>2</small>me<small>1</small>/: [shipitwome] → [shiɸitwome] → [shiɸitome]. Compound of {{m|ja|舅||in law|tr=shihito}} and {{m|ja|女||woman|tr=me}}. See next entry.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しひとめ}}

# a mother-in-law

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|しゅうとめ|yomi=k}}
From [[姑|shihitome]]: [shipitwome] → [shiɸitwome] → [shiɸitome] → [shiɸutome] → [shiwutome] → [shiutome] → [shuːtome].
